data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: The laboratory of a factory is the best place to learn about failure!

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: A company is most clearly defined not by its people or its history, but by it’s products.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Success is 99% failure.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: If I’d had to manage my company myself, I would have very quickly gone bankrupt.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: My biggest thrill is when I plan something and it fails. My mind is then filled with ideas on how I can improve it.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Hope, makes you forget all the difficult hours.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: I enjoy working, and it isn’t because I’m president that I would deprive myself of that pleasure!

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Few are those who see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex… It takes a touch of genius – and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: A man should look for what is, and not for what he thinks should be.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: A human being is part of a whole called by us the universe.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: The important thing is to not stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
